item.title: Triple Cheese American Veg Burger
item.desc: A crunchy Corn patty filled with Cheese, topped with Jalapenos, shredded Lettuce and more cheese, layered between our New Piri-Piri Buns.

item.title: McSpicy Premium Veg Burger
item.desc: A spicy Paneer patty, shredded Lettuce topped with Jalapenos and Cheese slice, Spicy Cocktail sauce & Cheese sauce layered between toasted Whole Wheat Buns.

item.title: Triple Cheese American Chicken Burger
item.desc: A flame-grilled Chicken patty filled with Cheese, topped with Jalapenos, shredded Lettuce and more Cheese, layered between layered between freshly toasted Piri Piri Buns.

item.title: McSpicy Premium Chicken Burger
item.desc: A spicy Chicken patty, shredded Lettuce topped with Jalapenos and Cheese slice, Spicy Habanero sauce & Cheese sauce layered between toasted Whole Wheat Buns.
